alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 4:52PM EST until January 11 at 1:18PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Maple street near the Red River Ranch as well as Pompeii Road off of Highway 15 are impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 PM EST Monday the stage was 17.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.9 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage by Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. The next statement will be issued by 11 PM.
